source: TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_SEQ_00<tab>Mawt is whispering to herself in sinister tones.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_SEQ_00<tab>ラジアタのモートは、不気味な雰囲気でなにかを呟いている。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_TODO_00<tab>Place the fresh vegetables at the designated location.
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_TODO_01<tab>Wait for an Abalathian catoblepas to appear, then use the paralytic powder on the creature and slay it for its eye.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA71801 /var>で待機して<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2188901 /var>に
<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DB001 /var>を使い討伐し、邪眼を入手

source: TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the catoblepas eye to Mawt.
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_000<tab>Do you know what a catoblepas is? You don't see them around much these days, but I spotted one that strayed from its herd.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_000<tab>貴方は「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2188901 /var>」をご存じ？
最近では、あまり見かけなくなってしまったけど、
実は、群れからはぐれた子を見かけたのです。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_001<tab>The eye of such a creature is said to possess baneful powers. I want it. I <var 1A 02 /var>need<var 1A 01 /var> it! Now, I'm just a delicate lass, but I'll wager you'd have no trouble popping it free from that wandering monster's skull.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_001<tab>その魔物の眼球は、邪眼と呼ばれる貴重な品ですわ。
これが、今、どうしても私に必要なのです……！
後生ですから、非力な私に代わり、取ってきてくださらない？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_002<tab>Here, I have it all planned out: bait this spot over to the west with these vegetables, and wait for the catoblepas to toddle over and take a nibble. Then you fling this paralytic powder in its face!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_002<tab>はぐれた子を見かけたのは、西の方……。
そこで「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DAF01 /var>」を置いて、魔物をおびきよせ、
この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DB001 /var>」を浴びせるのです！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_003<tab>That should slow it down enough to let you strike a clean killing blow─I don't want any harm to come to that precious eye. Right, then! I'll be waiting!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_003<tab>これで、魔物の動きを封じられましょう……。
あとはじっくりと倒してから、
邪眼を傷つけぬよう慎重に手に入れてください。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_004<tab>Was the plan not clear? Bait the spot with the vegetables, numb the catoblepas with the powder, then ease that wondrously evil eye from its socket!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_004<tab>はぐれた「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2188901 /var>」を見かけたのは、西の方……。
そこで「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DAF01 /var>」を置いて、魔物をおびきよせ、
この「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DB001 /var>」を浴びせるのです！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_005<tab>I get a talisman of accursed power, and you get a pick from my hoarded goods. We both win!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_005<tab>これで、魔物の動きを封じられましょう……。
あとはじっくりと倒してから、
邪眼を傷つけぬよう慎重に手に入れてください。

source:
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_010<tab>Evil eye, evil eye, how I wish that you were mine...
Well? Did you get it? Is it unblemished?
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_010<tab>可愛い可愛い「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DB101 /var>」……。
無傷で手に入れることはできましたか？

source: TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_011<tab>Yes! It's perfect! Ah, just gazing into this foreboding orb sends a chill through my soul!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_011<tab>あぁ～これです、これが欲しかったのです！
はぁ～なんて可愛らしい眼……。
見ているだけで、ゾクゾクします……！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_012<tab>As my dear, departed nana used to say, “If you want the nastiest curse, use the eye of a catoblepas!”
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_012<tab>亡くなったお祖母さまが言っていたのです。
人を呪うときには、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8DB101 /var>を供物にすると、
未来永劫苦しめることができる、と……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_013<tab>Ahahaha. Mwahaha! Gyahahahahaha! My revenge is nigh, you imperial bastards! May the fleas of a thousand jhammels infest your nethers!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ824_02852_MAWT_000_013<tab>はは、はははははははははははは……！
今に見てろよ、あのクソ帝国野郎！
散々こき使ってくれた礼は、倍にして返してやる……！
